forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
